name: Authentication Capability
description: Complete authentication capability with user management, sessions, OAuth, and security features

hooks.useUser: UseQueryResult<{ id: string; email: string; name?: string; emailVerified?: boolean; twoFactorEnabled?: boolean; createdAt: string }, Error>
hooks.useSession: UseQueryResult<{ userId: string; expires: string; issuedAt: string }, Error>
hooks.useAccounts: UseQueryResult<Array<{ id: string; provider: string; providerAccountId: string; createdAt: string }>, Error>
hooks.useSignIn: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean; userId?: string }, Error, { email: string; password: string }>
hooks.useSignUp: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean; userId?: string }, Error, { email: string; password: string; name?: string }>
hooks.useResetPassword: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { email: string }>
hooks.useUpdatePassword: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { oldPassword?: string; newPassword: string; resetToken?: string }>
hooks.useUpdateProfile: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { name?: string; email?: string }>
hooks.useVerifyEmail: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { token: string }>
hooks.useResendVerification: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { email: string }>
hooks.useEnableTwoFactor: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean; qrCodeUrl?: string; secret?: string }, Error, void>
hooks.useVerifyTwoFactor: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { token: string }>
hooks.useDisableTwoFactor: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { token: string }>
hooks.useOAuthCallback: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean; userId?: string }, Error, { provider: 'google' | 'github' | 'facebook' | 'twitter'; code: string }>
hooks.useDeleteAccount: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean }, Error, { password?: string }>
hooks.useExportData: UseMutationResult<{ success: boolean; downloadUrl?: string }, Error, void>
